summary: When an underground radio DJ makes fun of a fading pop star who happens to listen to his show, the two begin an unlikely relationship. But difficult life and career crossroads jeopardize their idyllic New York romance.
cast: Bryan Batt|Sebastian Beacon|Ashanti Brown|Jennifer Damiano|Jeanna de Waal|Ryan Eggold|Krystal Garner|Ryan Good|Curt Hansen|Warren Hemenway|Will Janowitz|Teresa Kelsey|Robert Lehrer|Elizabeth Masucci|Ryan Metcalf|Allyson Morgan|Tobias Segal|Liz Stauber|Jared Thompson|Lucy Walters|Sheilagh Weymouth
title: B-Side
